00029 #include "TargetedCellKiller.hpp"
00030 
00031 template<unsigned DIM>
00032 TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::TargetedCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation, unsigned targetedIndex, bool bloodLust)
00033 : AbstractCellKiller<DIM>(pCellPopulation),
00034   mTargetIndex(targetedIndex),
00035   mBloodLust(bloodLust)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 template<unsigned DIM>
00040 unsigned TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::GetTargetIndex() const
00041 {
00042     return mTargetIndex;
00043 }
00044 
00045 template<unsigned DIM>
00046 unsigned TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::GetBloodLust() const
00047 {
00048     return mBloodLust;
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<unsigned DIM>
00052 void TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00053 {
00054     if ( !mBloodLust || this->mpCellPopulation->GetNumRealCells()==0 || this->mpCellPopulation->GetNumRealCells()<mTargetIndex+1)
00055     {
00056         return;
00057     }
00058     this->mpCellPopulation->GetCellUsingLocationIndex(mTargetIndex)->Kill();
00059     mBloodLust = false;
00060 }
00061 
00062 template<unsigned DIM>
00063 void TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00064 {
00065     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<TargetIndex>" << mTargetIndex << "</TargetIndex>\n";
00066     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<BloodLust>" << mBloodLust << "</BloodLust>\n";
00067 
00068     // Call method on direct parent class
00069     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00070 }
00071 
00073 // Explicit instantiation
00075 
00076 template class TargetedCellKiller<1>;
00077 template class TargetedCellKiller<2>;
00078 template class TargetedCellKiller<3>;
00079 
00080 // Serialization for Boost >= 1.36
00081 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00082 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(TargetedCellKiller)
